issue.title: Remove MD5 checksums from release process
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2268](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2268). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The ASF has changed its release policy for signatures and checksums to contraindicate the use of MD5 checksums: http://www.apache.org/dev/release-distribution#sigs-and-sums. We should remove this from our various release scripts prior to the 0.9.0 release
